title: The Dream Igloo
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hey, does it snow in Numazu?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm, it doesn’t really snow that much, I guess. But why?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai would like to try making an igloo. If it does snow at your place, then Ai was thinking of making one there, Chikacchi<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, an igloo! I want to try making one too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Last time there was a big snowfall in Tokyo, Ai made one together with everyone in the shopping district. It was a lot of fun<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That sounds awesome! Did you eat mochi in the igloos?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai didn’t get to eat mochi, but Ai did drink hot lemonade. It tasted better than usual~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That’s nice. I want to try eating mikan in an igloo too! Do you know? Mikan also tastes delicious when roasted! It’s called roasted mikan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh, for real!? Ai can’t really imagine it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>It may be hard to make the igloos, but we can make roasted mikan anytime! Let’s do it right now~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
